markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Trilobite Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1348)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Trilobites typically live in close proximity to others of their kind. On rare occasions, particularly when the most common prey around is larger than what a single trilobite can take down, they form swarms that seem to actively cooperate with each other. These swarms latch onto their prey, and the combined efforts of so many trilobites at once make escape difficult.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Trilobite_TrilobiteSwarm.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Trilobite Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1348)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 275</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [wavesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 30

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 3, piercing 3, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 25 feet

**Clinging Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  The trilobites in the swarm latch onto creatures and gnaw at them. Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 2d6 slashing damage (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-271" />
name: Trilobite Swarm
